Articles.Content:
Hello! I'd like to introduce myself.

I've actually been on this site for a while, I never really made an account on it until now. I used to just go on the site to install mods and other things for KSP, but never have I really talked on here.

I've played KSP ever since kerbin had that ugly green grass texture, I was horrible at the game and would use cheats quite often. I returned to the game somewhere in March, and have made several accomplishments without cheats like landing on the Mun and Minmus. I then started to work on a planet pack that replaces the default solar system, me and a friend (Alaygrounds) are working on a planet pack named "The Homestead System" I plan on posting development progress and some screenshots of some planets and moons.

I also like to draw and paint stuff as well, I usually post most of my art on my twitter.

Welcome to the forum, @Mattdiction.

I can't wait to see some screenshots of your new system.
@James Kerman I have made a post of the planets in the system.
